entries.title: How a Rare Effort to Compensate Iraqi Airstrike Victims Failed
entries.description:
Seven years after a U.S.-planned airstrike on Hawija killed at least 85 civilians, a token of compensation has delivered little or no help to survivors.

The post How a Rare Effort to Compensate Iraqi Airstrike Victims Failed appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey Defies Biden With Border Wall Made of Shipping Containers
entries.description:
The Biden administration remains silent as the Republican governor brazenly builds an ad hoc wall on protected lands.

The post Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey Defies Biden With Border Wall Made of Shipping Containers appeared first on The Intercept.
